sections.title: How to measure?
sections.content: Stand upright and look straight ahead when measuring your body.

sections.title: Shoulder
sections.content: Measurement taken on the back of the body with measuring tape from one shoulder bone to other.

sections.title: Bust
sections.content: Measure around under your arm at the fullest part of your bust. Keep tape parallel to shoulder blades.

sections.title: Waist
sections.content: Measure around the narrowest part of your waist. Just above the navel and below the rib cage.

sections.title: Hips
sections.content: Measure around the widest part of your hips. This is about 20cm below your waist.

sections.title: Neck width
sections.content: Measurement taken in a straight line from the center front till your desired width.

sections.title: Sleeve length
sections.content: Measurement taken from the shoulder tip by placing tape towards tips.

sections.title: Sleeve opening
sections.content: Measurement across wrist at the bottom of the sleeve.

sections.title: Length
sections.content: Measure vertically from top of the shoulder till your required length.

sections.title: Ankle length
sections.content: In bare foot take the measurement from shoulder top till ankle.

sections.title: Floor level
sections.content: In bare foot take measurement from shoulder top till floor. Considered as full length without heels.

sections.title: Trouser waist
sections.content: Measurement taken below your natural waist. The waistband will rest at about 2 inches below your navel.
